trans-unit.source: The base class for all script reference classes.
trans-unit.target: 所有的脚本引用类的基类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 检索呈现为的值的 URL <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""></xref> control on the target Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_ScriptManager" name="ScriptManager" href=""> </xref>在目标网页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to compress the script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要压缩脚本;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the URL that is rendered as the value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 包含呈现为的值的 URL 的字符串<xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref>属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref>元素。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified script reference is an ASP.NET AJAX script.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的脚本引用是否为 ASP.NET AJAX 脚本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the script reference is an ASP.NET AJAX script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果脚本引用为 ASP.NET AJAX 脚本;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script.
trans-unit.target: 指示的复合脚本是否包含对 ASP.NET AJAX framework 脚本的引用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the composite script contains a reference to an ASP.NET AJAX framework script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果复合脚本包含对 ASP.NET AJAX framework 脚本; 的引用否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler"></xref> object automatically adds code at the end of the ECMAScript (JavaScript) file to call the client NotifyScriptLoaded method of the [Sys.Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) class.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.Handlers.ScriptResourceHandler"></xref>对象会自动在要调用的客户端 NotifyScriptLoaded 方法的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 文件的末尾添加代码[Sys.Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)类。

trans-unit.source: Set the NotifyScriptLoaded property to `false` if you reference a script file in an assembly and the script file already contains code to call [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md).
trans-unit.target: 将 NotifyScriptLoaded 属性设置为`false`如果引用脚本文件中程序集和脚本文件已包含代码以调用[Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md)。

trans-unit.source: An error is thrown if [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method is called more than one time from a script file.
trans-unit.target: 如果将引发错误[Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md)方法从脚本文件调用不止一次。

trans-unit.source: If you reference a standalone script file that is not embedded in an assembly, you must include code at the end of the script file to call the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method.
trans-unit.target: 如果引用不嵌入到程序集中的独立脚本文件，则必须包含要调用的脚本文件末尾的代码[Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md)方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the code to include at the end of the script file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示代码以包括在脚本文件的末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) method is automatically called at the end of a JavaScript file, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if user code calls the [Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) method that is already in the JavaScript file.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果[Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)的一个 JavaScript 文件，结束时自动调用方法或<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果用户代码调用[Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded](../Topic/Sys.Application.notifyScriptLoaded%20Method.md) JavaScript 文件中已存在的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the referenced client script file, relative to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置相对于 Web 页的引用的客户端脚本文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: The path of the referenced client script
trans-unit.target: 引用的客户端脚本的路径

trans-unit.source: Replaces the file-name extension in the specified script path to designate a debug script.
trans-unit.target: 替换指定调试脚本将指定的脚本路径中的文件扩展名。

trans-unit.source: This method assumes that the script has a ".js" extension.
trans-unit.target: 此方法假定该脚本拥有".js"扩展名。

trans-unit.source: It then replaces the extension with ".debug.js".
trans-unit.target: 它然后将替换的扩展"。 debug.js"。

trans-unit.source: The full path of the script to rename.
trans-unit.target: 要重命名的脚本的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The path must end with ".js".
trans-unit.target: 该路径必须以".js"结尾。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path of the script with the debug extension.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含具有调试扩展的脚本的路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited list of UI cultures that are supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以逗号分隔列表的支持的 UI 区域性<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a comma-delimited list of UI cultures.
trans-unit.target: 包含以逗号分隔列表的 UI 区域性的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the client script file (release or debug) to use.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置客户端脚本文件 （版本或调试） 若要使用的版本。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"></xref> value that indicates which version of the client script file to reference.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"> </xref>值，该值指示要引用的客户端脚本文件的版本。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptMode"> </xref>。
